title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 10.2 - Certification of copies
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 10.2 - Certification of copies

State Regulations

The commissioner, the State librarian and Assistant

Commissioner for Libraries, or the head of the manuscripts and history section
of the State Library, may, pursuant to section 382 of the Civil Practice Act, certify copies of or transcripts from books, manuscripts or other records in
the State Library. For the purpose of such certification, the seal of the
department may be used. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
10.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
